title: Import.io webinar: everyone can do data science
dc:creator: Louis Dorard
description:
Last week I visited the Import.io offices in London and did a webinar with 
them in which I showed:

    * how to use their tool to easily scrape real estate data from the web
    * how to clean that data with the Pandas library in Python
    * how to build a real-estate pricing model by sending the clean data to
      BigML.

Check out the video recording and the write-up they did!
